com.terei.jvector.gui
Class ImageExporter

java.lang.Object
  com.terei.jvector.gui.ImageExporter

public class ImageExporter
extends Object

This class manages the exporting of JVector images to various other formats, which are availible as plugins. It also provides the GUI for the user to do this.

Since:
2/06/2004
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei
See Also:
ImagePluginManager, ImagePlugin

          The file chooser dialog used to select the plugin and path to save to.

Method Detail

export

public static void export(ImageFile image,
                          File defaultDir)
Exports the image specified to a format and path specified by the user. This method shows a JFileChooser dialog box, listing the availible image outputs, and allows tehm to choose one and export it to the path chossen.

Parameters:
image - The image to export.
defaultDir - The starting directory to show for the JFileChooser, the proveious save locatio of the image is normally used.
